sys_atf_test.description:
-- Create Users -- 1 Get current admin user 2 Create "TimeSheet Manager" user 3 Create "TimeSheet Test" user with manager from 2 4 Create "TimeSheet Admin" user 5 Create "TimeSheet Finance" user 6 Add "TimeSheet Manager" to 'x_dehp_time_track.approver' role 7 Add "TimeSheet Test" user to 'x_dehp_time_track.user' role 8 Add "TimeSheet Admin" user to 'x_dehp_time_track.admin' role 9 Add "TimeSheet Finance" to 'x_dehp_time_track.finance' role
-- Create Time Sheet Policy -- 10 Create Testing Policy - No blank cards, no auto create, lookback 3 weeks, approver is manager, week starts Monday Submission Due 1 day after at noon, approval due 2 days after week at noon Requires between 20 and 40 hours per week 11 Add "TimeSheet Test" user to new policy
-- Build Account Types -- 12 Create "Test (With Tasks)" account type, and allow tasks 13 Create "Test (Without Tasks)" account type, do not allow tasks
-- Build Accounts with the following structure -- 14 100 - Top Account 15 110 - Sub Account 16 111 - Tasks 1 17 112 - Tasks 2 18 120 - Sub With Tasks
-- Create External Tasks -- 19 Create External Task, Number = TK-421, Short Description = External Expense Feature 20 Create External Task, Number = THX-1138, Short Description = External Capital Feature
-- Create General Time Categories -- -- (Link to Feature/Task = false) -- -- (Charge Code = Expense) -- 21 Create Time Category Name = General 120 Account = Step 18: (120 - Sub With Tasks) 22 Create Time Category Name = Stuff 120 Account = Step 18: (120 - Sub With Tasks) 23 Create Time Category Name = General 111 Account = Step 16: (111 - Tasks 1) 24 Create Time Category Name = Stuff 112 Account = Step 17: (112 - Tasks 2)
-- Create Task Time Categories -- -- (Link to Feature/Task = true) -- 25 Create Time Cateogry Account = Step 17: (112 - Tasks 2) Task = Step 20: (THX-1138) Charge Code = Capital 26 Create Time Cateogry Account = Step 17: (112 - Tasks 2) Task = Step 19: (TK-421) Charge Code = Expense
-- Create Rate Card -- 27 Create Rate Card, start date Dec 1, 2018, Rate of 19.99 28 Link rate card to "TimeSheet Test" user (step 3)
sys_atf_test.name: Time Sheet - Base Record Creation
